Actions.Name: Send a system message in chat
Actions.Description: This operation sends a system message in a chat session.

Actions.Name: When a chat session is created or updated
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a chat is created or updated.

Actions.Name: Send a notification to a contact
Actions.Description: This operation sends a notification to a contact in the client portal.

Actions.Name: Send a notification to a member
Actions.Description: This operation sends a notification to a member in the tech portal.

Actions.Name: When a ticket is created or updated
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a ticket is created or updated.

Actions.Name: Find companies
Actions.Description: Find companies by keywords or filters.

Actions.Name: Find contacts
Actions.Description: Find contacts by keywords or filters.

Actions.Name: Find members
Actions.Description: Find members by keywords or filters.

Actions.Name: Create an email from template
Actions.Description: This operation generates an HTML document from a dynamic email template. Dynamic email templates can be managed in your admin portal.

Actions.Name: Get a company
Actions.Description: This operation returns a company's details.

Actions.Name: Get a contact
Actions.Description: This operation returns a contact's details.

Actions.Name: Get a form result
Actions.Description: This operation returns the form entry by the form result ID.

Actions.Name: Get a member
Actions.Description: This operation returns a member's details.

Actions.Name: Get a ticket
Actions.Description: This operation returns a ticket's details.

Actions.Name: Invite users to chat
Actions.Description: This operation invites users to a chat session.

Actions.Name: When a workflow is triggered
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when the specified workflow is triggered. Workflows can be managed in your admin portal.
